Career

Our team is growing! We’re an agile company of talented drilling engineers, data scientists and software development experts. We value ideas, entrepreneurial attitude and team playing. Interested in working for Exebenus?

Vacancies

Vacancies

Project manager

As our Product Manager you will be the driving force for continued development of our real-time machine learning software tool Exebenus Current ML™ for the oil & gas industry. This includes defining success criteria for our product and continuously develop, improve, and release it.

Location: Stavanger, Norway
Employment type: Permanent position
